creator: clever_boy_2000cn@yahoo.com.cn
text:

occassionally appears no content(not a char at all).when i search the log of

creator: clever_boy_2000cn@yahoo.com.cn

text:
1) Bugzilla is not a support forum please use the tomcat-user list.
2) We are not supporting tomcat 4.0 beta

http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/faq/
creator: funkman@joedog.org
